description: Analyzes attendance data from VeloDB and generates real-time subject-wise and student-wise reports, trends, and summaries for five subjects (MEFA, DBMS, OS, JAVA, PYTHON).

result.subject: The subject name (MEFA, DBMS, OS, JAVA, PYTHON, or ALL)
result.trend_summary: Trend analysis: improving, declining, or stable with explanation
result.report_summary: Comprehensive summary of the attendance report
